thread.title: Another Snapchat selfie 'demon' shaped like mini-beast dog stares back at horrified young woman
thread.title_full: Another Snapchat selfie 'demon' shaped like mini-beast dog stares back at horrified young woman - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Another Snapchat selfie 'demon' shaped like mini-beast dog stares back at horrified young woman
text:
Another Snapchat selfie 'demon' shaped like mini-beast dog stares back at horrified young woman Tara McPadden, 25, was horrified to see another face appear in her picture with haunting eyes staring at her Share Comments By Natalie Evans 00:38, 10 FEB 2017 News Tara McPadden was horrified by what she saw (Photo: Tara mcpadden/Snapchat) Another Snapchat user has revealed a chilling 'demon' appeared in her picture.
Tara McPadden was taking a selfie using the dog filter when she saw another pair of eyes staring back at her.
The app's facial recognition feature had picked up another 'person' on her neck.
The 'mini beast' stared back with dog ears and a muzzle.
Read More Young woman takes Snapchat selfie and finds 'demon' staring back at her in chilling picture The 25-year-old saw another 'demon' in her selfie (Photo: Tara mcpadden/Snapchat) On Wednesday, Snapchat user Rachael Gardiner revealed she was left horrified to see a demonic face looking back at her from her selfie .
The 22-year-old expected the picture to show purple flowers around her head.
Instead, she spotted a terrifying face had appeared on her neck and left her boyfriend "freaked out".

Second cockroach in a week 0:32 This wedding was saved in the most amazing way af 2:51 ​Bristol students accused of 'cultural appropriat 1:20 School bus crashes and overturns with 50 pupils o 1:24 What's going on with chicken? Boy's lucky escape after he threw banger down dra 0:27 Video will play in Share this video Watch Next Rachael can be seen in a normal picture (Photo: Fortitude Press) Rachel of East Kilbride, just outside Glasgow said: "I’d seen other people using the filter so I went on Snapchat to try and look pretty and that thing appeared.
"I noticed it straight away.
"I took the picture and showed my boyfriend who was instantly freaked out.
"I couldn't believe how creepy it looked and showed everyone in work and posted it on Facebook and everyone there thought it looked like a demon."
Rachael Gardiner, 22, wanted to take the perfect selfie but ended up with a terrifying image (Photo: Fortitude Press) After reading Rachel's story, Tara, from Kirkby, came forward to claim the same thing had happened to her.
Sharing her eerie picture, the 25-year-old told Mirror Online: "People do not believe this young girl with this Snapchat picture saying it's all lies!
"I took this picture on Snapchat myself and it come up with face."
